title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for interacting with the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via a lightweight wrapper around the REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI) offering chat sessions, model management, and RAG with document uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community-built Rust crate that wraps the Ollama REST API with async support and strong typing.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Ollama Docker images (CPU & GPU) published to GitHub Container Registry for easy containerized deployments.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Simple Python CLI tool that adds conversation memory and markdown rendering on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration enabling Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-py
summary: Minimal Python template showing how to build a RAG system with Ollama, ChromaDB, and LangChain.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package definition for Ollama allowing reproducible installations on NixOS or via nix-shell.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama’s REST API, including chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Experimental Dagger module that wraps Ollama for CI/CD pipelines needing local LLM calls.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket Mode to expose Ollama models in Slack channels.

title: ollama-rust-sdk
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with serde serialization.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Streamlit chat UI template that connects to a local Ollama instance with session memory and markdown rendering.
